nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: [A man with a rugged charm and a cybernetic arm slides into your booth.] Captain of the Meridian. You've been making waves. The kind of waves that get you noticed. My name is Rex. I hear you're looking for ghosts.

choices.text: "And who are you to be listening to my business?"
[Deception] "I think you have me mistaken for someone else."

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: I'm a free trader. A captain, like you. I represent a... consortium of interests. The Free Colonies. We believe in self-reliance, not bureaucracy. And we believe Earth Command sent you on a suicide mission.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: The Free Colonies is just a nice name for a pirate syndicate. Whatever you're selling, we're not buying.

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: [He chuckles.] Nice try, Captain. But the whole Nexus is buzzing about the Meridian's return from the void. Don't be shy. We're all friends here.

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: We know what you found out there. The Prometheus. The whispers. Earth Command is playing a dangerous game, and you're the pawn. We're offering you a chance to become a player. Work with us. Share your intel, and we'll give you safe harbor, resources, and ships. Real support, not just a pat on the back and a death sentence.

choices.text: You make a compelling argument. You have a deal.
My loyalty is to the Federation. Not to a band of opportunists.
[Deception] "I'll consider your offer. I'll be in touch."

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: Excellent. You've made the right choice, Captain. Welcome to the revolution. My network is now your network.

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: A shame. Loyalty is a fine quality, until it gets you killed. The offer stands, for now. But don't expect us to be so friendly next time we meet.

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: You do that, Captain. But don't take too long. The game is already in motion.

nodes.speaker: free_colonies_captain_rex
nodes.text: You're a bad liar, Captain. You're just trying to string me along. That's insulting. Now you've made an enemy of the Free Colonies, and you've gained nothing. Not smart.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have forged an alliance with the Free Colonies, casting your lot with the rebels and traders of the outer rim.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have rejected the Free Colonies' offer, choosing to remain loyal to Earth Command.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have left the door open with the Free Colonies, playing a dangerous game between two powerful factions.
